descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[/center]VEGA Compatibility Patching[list=1][*]Download my patch [/*]
<br />[*]Click the black text ‘Patch Nearox Overhaul - STEP Core.esp ‘ to download, all the other stuff is bad crap[/*]
<br />[*]Use your explorer to go to your Mod Organizer/mods directory. Create a new folder called “Patch Nearox Overhaul – STEP Core”. Put the downloaded file in that folder[/*]
<br />[*]Open Mod Organizer and refresh the installed mod list.[/*]
<br />[*]Enable the mod in both the installed list and in the load order[/*]
<br />[*]Open Boss Userlist Manager. Select ‘Patch Nearox Overhaul - STEP Core.esp. Click the AFTER selection box and select BOTTOM. In the empty field next to it, type: Compatibility Patches. Click [save rule]. Close BUM and save changes when asked.[/*]
<br />[*]Run BOSS and make sure again that the patch is enabled in the load order. It should now be right above the bashed patch.[/*]
<br />[/list]
author: Nearox
